Author: crumbly-toast
Text: Thank you :) every day is a bit of a challenge, today is worse than usual but I'm pushing through. Hope you're doing well,  love

Author: wishamfwould
Text: IMO mentioning people’s weight in general is rude as fuck. The older generation are used to comments like it so they say it so easily but I’m sorry you were put in a situation like that.   Two years! That’s amazing! I can only imagine haha. I hope you can push past this, I know you can.
